summary: An expression-statement facilitates the use of an expression as a statement.
details: The return-value, if any, of the expression is simply ignored.
example-1: module Main in examples;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    # The following line is an expression used as a statement.%0A    My::printNumber(17);%0A}%0A%0Adefun printNumber (x : int) : void%0A{%0A    F::println(%22x = %22 .. x);%0A}
